name: SCP-1678 Unlondon
description:
Short RPG Maker horror game that lets you explore the anomalous city SCP-1678 Unlondon

SCP-1678 is a EUCLID class entity otherwise known as Unlondon. SCP-1678 is a full scale reconstruction of London located exactly one kilometre underneath the original city of London. 

In this game you'll explore the streets, buildings and cemeteries of Unlondon as an SCP Mobile Task Force officer looking for your missing team members. Find items to unlock new areas, refill your health with 'Dr. Goody's Wonderfood' and fight the horrifying entities that dwell in the forgotten city.

This game was created as a game jam submission for 3rd RPG maker horror game jam.

Used software / resources:

  • RPG Maker MV
  • Tutorials from SRDude on youtube: SRDude - YouTube
  • Robot voice generator by "Lingojam": Robot Voice Generator
  • Background music by "Scott ARC": RITUAL
  • Battle music by "Scott ARC": ANGEL'S LAUGHTER

SCP-1678 Unlondon is based on "SCP-1678" by "AstronautJoe":  Original SCP entry page

This is my first game jam submission and my first time making a game with RPG maker so please let me know if you come across any problems/bugs in your playthrough!
